name: For the Trees
description:
Arrow Keys or WASD to move.

Pick three flowers every night. If you start trembling, it's time to run.

Submitted to the Pixel Horror Jam and Halloween Jam 2016.

HALLOWEEN UPDATE (2017/10/21): 

  • Added some secrets.
  • Made the game a bit shorter.

UPDATE (2016/10/29):

  • Reduced number of flowers required to complete a night.
  • Added a surprise for Night 3
